promptPrefix:
Can you help me check the following article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] to see if it contains sensitive keywords, horrifying elements, anger-inducing content, or shocking material:
[PROMPT]


Part 1: Please provide the results of the content check.
Part 2: Please provide the revised version of the article with any harmful elements removed once they have been identified.

In The Very Bottom of the article Write This Custom Massage "

============================================

Follow me:  https://www.facebook.com/phihoreal
title: Checking Harmful Content by PhiHo
